Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.business

Class Business

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.business.Business
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationSerializable
public final class Business extends Object implements ConfigurationSerializable
Represents a Novaconomy Business

    • getLeftoverStock

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<ItemStack> getLeftoverStock()

      Fetches any extra stock that are no longer products in the Business.

      This method can be used to fetch stock of products that sold on deleted economies.

      Returns:
      Extra Stock

    • supply

      public void supply()
      Adds the resources from all of the supply chests to the Business's inventory, calling BusinessSupplyEvent. This method will silently fail if the event is cancelled.

      Parameters:
      keywords - Keywords to add

    • addKeywords

      public void addKeywords(@Nullable @Nullable Iterable<String> keywords) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a collection of keywords to the Business.
      Parameters:
      keywords - Keywords to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if keywords are too long or the business has exceeded the amount of keywords

    • leaveParentCorporation

      public void leaveParentCorporation() throws IllegalStateException
      Makes this Business leave its parent Corporation.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this Business is not in a Corporation

    • getCorporationJoinDate

      Returns:

    • randomAdvertisingBusiness

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Business randomAdvertisingBusiness()

      Fetches a random business based on its advertising balance.

      Will return null if NovaConfig.isAdvertisingEnabled() is false.

      Returns:
      Random Business
